tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE demand_forecasting (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  demand_forecast INT CHECK (demand_forecast >= 0),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE demand_forecasting_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  forecast_date DATE NOT NULL,
  demand_quantity INT NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_product_id FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_orders (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  order_date DATE NOT NULL,
  order_quantity INT NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_product_id FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id)
);

CREATE TABLE DemandForecasting (
  ProductID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Date DATE NOT NULL,
  ForecastValue DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_product
    FOREIGN KEY (ProductID)
    REFERENCES Products(ProductID)
);

CREATE TABLE SalesData (
  SaleID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ProductID INT NOT NULL,
  SaleDate DATE NOT NULL,
  SaleAmount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_product
    FOREIGN KEY (ProductID)
    REFERENCES Products(ProductID)
);
CREATE TABLE ProductDetails (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, unit_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL CHECK(unit_price > 0), last_update TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)
